description: Ms. codex. Title from lower edge. Title given by a later hand on fol. 1b erroneously reads "Hafız Divani tercümesi." Physical description: 23 lines per page; written in naskh-nastaʻliq in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords; some marginal notes. Damp staining around margins. In good condition. Origin: Original text completed the evening of 4 Dhū al-Ḥijjah 966 H [6 September 1559]; this copy completed at the end of Jumādá II 1020 H [September 1611] by Hacı Abdürrahim Semerkandî (fol. 233b). Incipit: الحمد لله الذى عىن اعىان الدىن لاجراء عىن العلم و ىنبوع الىقىن
author: Surūrī, Muṣliḥ al-Dīn, 1492-1562
abstract: Second part of a Turkish commentary on the Dīvān of Ḥāfiẓ, beginning with the letter ʻayn to the end of the Dīvān.
extent: 233 leaves : paper ; 213 x 153 (155 x 95) mm bound to 214 x 155 mm
provenance: On fol. 1a, several owner's stamps and notes, some of which are blackened out, as well as birth notices. On fol. 1b, smudged stamp. On fol. 233b, stamp of Yahya, 1283 H [1866 or 7].
creator: Surūrī, Muṣliḥ al-Dīn, 1492-1562
سرورى، مصلح الدىن، 1492-1562
subject: Ḥāfiẓ, 14th cent—Dīvān.
binding_note: Full brown leather with blind-stamped central mandorla and pendants and blind-tooled fillets; marbled paper doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
